# Olatunji Johnson

![](images/profile.jpg){.rounded-circle width="160"}

Spatial statistician focused on **Bayesian spatio-temporal modelling**, **disease mapping**, and **ML + geostatistics** for global health.

[Download CV](files/cv.pdf){.btn .btn-primary} [View Publications](/publications/){.btn .btn-outline-secondary} [Email](mailto:olatunjijohnson21111@gmail.com){.btn .btn-outline-secondary}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## What I work on

-   **Methods:** Model-based geostatistics, non-stationary GPs, spatio-temporal inference, uncertainty quantification.\
-   **Applications:** NTDs, vaccination coverage, epidemiological decision-support (risk maps & exceedance).\
-   **Software:** Reproducible tools & teaching apps in R/Python (e.g., MBG workflows, visualization).
